snippet: Yahoo's embattled chief executive, Scott Thompson, told the company's senior management on Thursday that he never submitted a résumé or falsified his academic credentials, a person briefed on the matter said.
abstract: Yahoo's embattled chief executive, Scott Thompson, told the company's senior management on Thursday that he never submitted a résumé or falsified his academic credentials, a person briefed on the matter said.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Yahoo's Chief Said to Tell Executives He Did Not Submit a Résumé
